title: On deceased actors
author: VD
content_html: I have zero interest in Hollywood, its products, its digital rights management schemes or its denizens. For those who feel otherwise, this would be your place to lament the late Mr. Ledger. Or, for that matter, the late Fred Thompson campaign.
content_text: I have zero interest in Hollywood, its products, its digital rights management schemes or its denizens.  For those who feel otherwise, this would be your place to lament the late Mr. Ledger.  Or, for that matter, the late Fred Thompson campaign.
